item.description:
I went last year and the information they presented concerning Backpacking was pretty cool. There's also the possibility of winning free gear, which is awesome as well. Registration is limited to 40 and as of 5/3 there were only 32 spots left, so register quickly by clicking on the link below:

********************************

Join Outdoor Pros Sheri and Randy Propster as they bring the pages of Backpacker to life! 

  • Check-out the latest in outdoor gear and apparel
  • Learn essential skills from the experts at Backpacker
  • Win great outdoor prizes

For more information: http://www.getoutmoretour.com/

To register: http://www.rei.com/event/39625/session/49976
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting Penn State attire
item.name: Backpacker Magazine Get Out More Tour
